thread.title: Friday Focus: TPT: A Pioneer for Africa
thread.title_full: Friday Focus: TPT: A Pioneer for Africa

title: Friday Focus: TPT: A Pioneer for Africa
text:
18   Container Handling , Containers , Going Places , Port Planning , Ports , Shipping A video released by Transnet Port Terminals (TPT) shows its position as the largest logistics operation on the African continent, where it operates both terminals and logistics processes in the southern region of the country. 
TPT provide integrated end-to-end multimodal logistics services, and while they claim a cost-effective service, they widely held as the biggest and busiest fully integrated container terminal network in Sub-Saharan Africa. 
As part of its focus, TPT connect importers and exporters throughout South Africa, with the country becoming an important hub for transhipment. 
(Source: Colin van Dongen)
